abstract: Lawrence S Schwartz, longtime aid to New York Gov Andrew Cuomo, joins private sector as chief strategy officer for OTG Management, which operates businesses at two New York metropolitan airports.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence S. Schwartz, the former secretary to the governor, was known for his combative role in the troubled life of the Moreland Commission.

headline.main: Governor Cuomo’s Former Aide Moves to the Private Sector
headline.print_headline: Another Ex-Cuomo Aide Is Hired as Executive at Airport Company

snippet: Lawrence S. Schwartz, the former secretary to the governor, was known for his combative role in the troubled life of the Moreland Commission.
